column4: _`xeon_: I don't know how well konversation supports scripts. I suggest you have a look-see on the homepages. Also to upgrade packages: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
_`xeon_: If you want a newer version than the one in the repositories (NOT RECOMENDED) you will most likely need to compile them yourself.
No, suprise suprise he didn't. He's human.
